def is_near_power_source(coffee_maker:item):
    # Function to check if the coffee maker is near a power source
    symbol near_power_source=exists socket: item : is_powersocket(socket) and close(coffee_maker, so
cket)
    return near_power_source

behavior plug_in_coffee_maker(coffee_maker:item):
    body:
        if has_plug(coffee_maker) and not plugged(coffee_maker):
            plugin(coffee_maker)

behavior start_coffee_maker(coffee_maker:item):
    body:
        if is_near_power_source(coffee_maker):
            plug_in_coffee_maker(coffee_maker)
            switch_on(coffee_maker)

behavior make_coffee(coffee_maker:item, cup:item):
    body:
        if has_water(coffee_maker) and clean(cup):
            put_close(cup, coffee_maker)
            start_coffee_maker(coffee_maker)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind coffee_maker: item where:
            is_coffe_maker(coffee_maker)
        bind cup: item where:
            is_cup(cup)
        make_coffee(coffee_maker, cup)

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['Make a cup of coffee using the coffee maker.']

def check_coffee_maker_ready(coffee_maker:item):
    # Determine if the coffee maker is prepared to make coffee
    symbol coffee_maker_ready=has_plug(coffee_maker) and plugged(coffee_maker) and is_on(coffee_make
r)
    return coffee_maker_ready

def coffee_maker_with_cup(coffee_maker:item, cup:item):
    # Check if the cup is placed for coffee making
    symbol has_cup=on(cup, coffee_maker)
    return has_cup

behavior prepare_coffee_maker(coffee_maker:item):
    body:
        if not plugged(coffee_maker):
            plugin(coffee_maker)
        if not is_on(coffee_maker):
            switch_on(coffee_maker)

behavior place_cup_for_coffee(coffee_maker:item, cup:item):
    body:
        put_on(cup, coffee_maker)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind coffee_maker: item where:
            is_coffe_maker(coffee_maker)
        bind cup: item where:
            is_cup(cup)
        
        if not check_coffee_maker_ready(coffee_maker):
            prepare_coffee_maker(coffee_maker)
        
        if not coffee_maker_with_cup(coffee_maker, cup):
            place_cup_for_coffee(coffee_maker, cup)
